languages.text: "Объявляю Праса виновным. Приведите его сюда для казни".
languages.translation_comment:
Стартует этюд VP_HostWin
Казним астропата, весы направо

traits.locale_text: "Объявляю Праса виновным. Приведите его сюда для казни".

languages.translation_comment:
Стартует этюд VP_HostWin
Казним астропата, весы направо

languages.text: "I declare Pras guilty. Escort him here for his execution."
languages.original_text: "Объявляю Праса виновным. Приведите его сюда для казни".

traits.locale_text: "I declare Pras guilty. Escort him here for his execution."
"I dare not question the Doleful Host's methods. Hand Pras over to them."
"I declare Pras guilty. Escort him here for his execution."
"I dare not question the Doleful Host's methods. Hand the head of the Astropathic Choir over to them."
"I dare not question the Doleful Host's methods. Hand Pras over to them."
"I declare Pras guilty. Escort him here for his execution."
"I dare not question the Doleful Host's methods. Hand Pras over to them."
"I declare Pras guilty. Escort him here for his execution."
"I declare Pras guilty. Escort him here for his execution."
"I declare Pras guilty. Escort him here for his execution."

languages.text: "Ich erkläre Pras für schuldig. Bringt ihn zu seiner Hinrichtung her."
languages.original_text: "I declare Pras guilty. Escort him here for his execution."

traits.locale_text: "Ich erkläre Pras für schuldig. Bringt ihn zu seiner Hinrichtung her."

languages.text: « Je déclare Pras coupable. Escortez-le jusqu'ici afin qu'il soit exécuté. »
languages.original_text: "I declare Pras guilty. Escort him here for his execution."

traits.locale_text: « Je déclare Pras coupable. Escortez-le jusqu'ici afin qu'il soit exécuté. »

languages.text: “我宣判普拉斯有罪。把他押到这里，执行死刑。”
languages.original_text: "I declare Pras guilty. Escort him here for his execution."

traits.locale_text: “我宣判普拉斯有罪。把他押到这里，执行死刑。”
“我无意质疑阴沉之主的做法，把普拉斯交给他们吧。”

languages.text: «Declaro culpable a Pras. Tráiganlo aquí para su ejecución».
languages.original_text: "I declare Pras guilty. Escort him here for his execution."

traits.locale_text: «Declaro culpable a Pras. Tráiganlo aquí para su ejecución».

languages.text: 「プラスの有罪を宣告する。ここに連れてきて処刑しろ」
languages.original_text: "I declare Pras guilty. Escort him here for his execution."

traits.locale_text: 「プラスの有罪を宣告する。ここに連れてきて処刑しろ」
「ドールフル・ホストのやり方を疑う気はない。プラスを彼らに引き渡せ」

languages.text: "Pras'ı suçlu buluyorum. İdam edilmek üzere buraya kadar refakat edin."
languages.original_text: "I declare Pras guilty. Escort him here for his execution."

traits.locale_text: "Pras'ı suçlu buluyorum. İdam edilmek üzere buraya kadar refakat edin."
"Konakçı'nın yöntemlerini sorgulamaya cüret edemem. Pras'ı teslimini emrediyorum."
